DatabaseMigration.backupConn: Data Source = ;Initial Catalog = master;Integrated Security = true;Connection Timeout=0;Application Name=SQL Poseidon
DatabaseMigration.restoreConn: Data Source = ;Initial Catalog = master;Integrated Security = true;Connection Timeout=0;Application Name=SQL Poseidon
DatabaseMigration.fullDBRestoreQuery: MOVE 'TestDB' TO 'C:\Program Files\Microsoft SQL Server\MSSQL15.MSSQLSERVER\MSSQL\DATA\TestDB_bbb.mdf' , MOVE 'TestDB_log' TO 'C:\Program Files\Microsoft SQL Server\MSSQL15.MSSQLSERVER\MSSQL\DATA\TestDB_log_bbb.ldf' , MOVE 'TestDB_ndf' TO 'C:\Program Files\Microsoft SQL Server\MSSQL15.MSSQLSERVER\MSSQL\DATA\TestDB_ndf.ndf'
